entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill near minus 27. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 9:00 AM MDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:00 AM MDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 9:00 AM MDT Saturday 15 April 2023
